trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_SEQ_00<tab>Hobriaut is suffering at the hands of the taskmaster Marcette.

TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_SEQ_01<tab>You agree to conduct a water survey on behalf of Hobriaut, who has been worked to the point of exhaustion by the unforgiving taskmaster Marcette. Obtain three bottles of water from Hopeseed Pond.
TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_SEQ_02<tab>You have completed the water survey entrusted to the young researcher Hobriaut. Deliver the three bottles of water to him.
TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_SEQ_03<tab>Though your assistance will spare Hobriaut from feeling Marcette's wrath today, the young researcher still fears for his life.
TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_TODO_00<tab>Obtain water samples from Hopeseed Pond.
TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the bottles of water to Hobriaut.

TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_HOBRIAUT_000_000<tab><pant> <pant> I swear to you, that woman is a fiend! A monster! A greater danger to this realm than all the beast tribes put together, and then some! Why, I speak of Marcette, of course.

TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_HOBRIAUT_000_001<tab>No sooner did I return with the three hundred hornet stingers she requested than she sends me off to conduct a water survey at Hopeseed Pond! In my condition, I'm like to fall in face-first and drown. Oh, friend, I'm too young to die! Please say you'll help me...you must!

TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_HOBRIAUT_000_010<tab>I don't want to be Research Assistant Seven, Twelve, or Forty-three! I just want to go hoooooome─hm? Ah, praise the gods, you're back. Were you able to complete the survey?

TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_HOBRIAUT_000_020<tab>One, two, three samples from Hopeseed Pond. Wonderful! I cannot thank you enough. Though I cannot help but ponder what other backbreaking tasks might be in my future... Pluck the wisdom teeth of a goobbue? Procure a leaf from a treant's head? The gods only know.
TEXT_GAIUSA911_00806_HOBRIAUT_000_021<tab>Grandfather, Grandmother...can you hear me up there? Your dear grandson shall be joining you all too soon...
